Articles.Content: Clean install of 1.1.3 on MacBook Pro (i7 8G Iris Pro 15" Retina) immediately hits and stays at 100% (Activity Monitor claimed 224%). I shut it down after a few minutes of troubleshooting due to overheating. For testing, I tried installing with "Allow apps downloaded from Anywhere" enabled in Preferences/Security. I also confirmed that Me and Staff have R/W permissions for the KSP_osx folder. The KSP.Log file, including several errors, is posted at http://pastebin.com/JrW4Nju9. I would really appreciate any help. Thanks...Scott
Running 1.2 fixed the CPU issue and most of the errors. I just bought the app and thought I downloaded the latest build. Sorry for the false alarm...Scott
